readingMnemonic: The <kanji>reason</kanji> that this Cross of Reason exists is to combat the <reading>you</reading>ths (ゆう) of the world, who just bring chaos into everything.
meaningMnemonic: A giant <radical>cross</radical> with a <radical>mouth</radical> stands above you. "I am <kanji>reason</kanji>!" it says to you. It is the Cross of Reason.
